title: Picking My Role

replies.body: Get kills as support. Make your adc rage. Win games. (Me when I play {{champion:25}} )

You should main whatever you have the most fun playing, otherwise you'll get real tired of it real fast.

I'd say spam jungle and mid a lot and see which one you enjoy more.

That being said, being a jungler in solo-queue is very different from being a jungler on a team - so take that into account.

Just keep in mind, having a main role doesn't mean you can't play and enjoy other roles.  The best players, even though they have one role they try to master, are able to proficiently play every role in the game.  Your main role should be the role you prefer playing, and would love to play if you could only play one role from now until the end of time.

If you want to be able to help your teammates win lanes, get objectives, and usually be the front-line of a teamfight you should pick jungle. If you're good at winning lane, snowballing, carrying LATEGAME you should try top. If you are good at winning lane, roaming other lanes, snowballing pick mid. If you like giving your team a huge buff at securing objectives/kills pick support. If you like getting most of the kills, being the back-line damage dealer, you're good at position, pick ADC. 

Honestly, in my opinion I think mid/jungle has the most influence on games with support coming in as 3rd. Mid can snowball his lane  while helping other lanes win theirs, jungle can win all 3 lanes if hes good, get most objectives, and snowball. I like support also because a good support will always be aware of dragon, ganks, letting his team push lanes safely, and getting his WHOLE team fed vs a bad support who lets their teammates die, don't have any kill constribution, and don't have important objectives warded.
